page.title: 09Locks Heath Centre
page.content: Locks Heath Centre took about{nine {months}to build.It was built to help shoppers in the area so that they didn't have to go far away to do their shopping.As you enter there is a garage and a car park.It has {twenty-six shops}and two{playgrounds for older and younger children.It also has sports facilities,toilets,a clock tower and a dentist. Lockswood was a good place for children to play football,hide and seek,go horseriding and play on their bikes.There was a large field where people had picnics and took their dogs for a walk.{Gypsies}used to go there but they were removed by the Council and were stopped by ditches around the side.People probably miss taking their {dogs for a walk}and seeing all the animals and flowers mainly bluebells, buttercups and daisies.
